componentContainer.title: EC-DSLIDE Help
componentContainer.pre:
Welcome to ElectricFlow DSL Editor
Enter your DSL commands and press "Submit DSL" to run.
Press Ctrl+Spacebar to view a list available DSL commands. Type first few letters of a command to filter the list.
Use the "Examples" pull-down menu to load sample DSL scripts.
Select a DSL command and press the "?" button to get help on that command.
Buttons - Click "File Open" to open a client-side DSL file. - Click "File Save" to save a client-side DSL file. - Click "Undo" to undo the previous change. - Click "Erase" to delete the contents in the results field. - Click "Format" to format the contents of the the DSL field. - Click "?" to view the Help documentation.
For example, to insert a subprocedure step, click "Insert Subprocedure Step", which will populate the "Choose a Project" pull-down menu. Choose the project to which the procedure belongs, which will populate the "Choose a Procedure" pull-down menu, and then select a procedure. The step template will appear in the editor.
